name: Basketball
description: Fast-paced court sport emphasizing shooting, dribbling, passing, and team strategy. Develops hand-eye coordination, agility, and cardiovascular fitness.

name: Soccer
description: The world's most popular sport focusing on footwork, endurance, and team tactics. Builds cardiovascular endurance, agility, and spatial awareness.

name: Baseball/Softball
description: America's pastime combining batting, fielding, and pitching skills. Develops hand-eye coordination, throwing accuracy, and strategic thinking.

name: Football
description: High-intensity team sport requiring strength, speed, and strategic execution. Builds power, agility, and teamwork skills.

name: Swimming
description: Full-body aquatic sport developing all four competitive strokes. Builds cardiovascular endurance, full-body strength, and technique precision.

name: Track & Field
description: Diverse athletic events including sprints, distance running, jumps, and throws. Develops speed, power, endurance, and specialized technique.

name: Tennis
description: Racquet sport combining power, precision, and endurance. Builds hand-eye coordination, agility, and mental toughness.

name: Golf
description: Precision sport requiring technique, mental focus, and course management. Develops fine motor skills, concentration, and strategic thinking.

name: Volleyball
description: Dynamic court sport emphasizing jumping, hitting, and team coordination. Builds vertical leap, reflexes, and communication skills.

name: Gymnastics
description: Acrobatic sport requiring strength, flexibility, and artistic expression. Develops body control, core strength, and spatial awareness.

name: Wrestling
description: Combat sport focusing on grappling techniques and body control. Builds functional strength, mental toughness, and discipline.

name: Hockey
description: Fast-paced ice or field sport combining skating/running with stick skills. Develops speed, coordination, and team play.

name: Lacrosse
description: Fast-growing sport combining running, catching, and shooting with a crosse. Builds endurance, hand-eye coordination, and field awareness.
